channel.title: intelligence on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in intelligence on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Recognising intelligent life on Earth
item.description: Recognising intelligent life on Earth Looks like humans are finally understanding how to recognise intelligence in life forms apart from themselves. I hope we will start to expand our definition enough to include many more species and understand our true place in the ecosystem.

item.title: Letters from Edinburgh: 4
item.description: **22/09/2009 EDINBURGH PART 4: ZAPPED** Hi! I had my first classes today so after an all-girls Birthday party (of our new American friend) last night with yum brownies, I organised my things for today and slept as early as possible.
